reason: Significant regulatory tightening across major jurisdictions (Dubai banning privacy tokens, UK pushing for donation bans, US scrutiny on stablecoins) combined with the looming US inflation report creates substantial market uncertainty and downside risk. While individual altcoin speculation exists (Monero), the broader market sentiment is cautious, pointing towards potential distribution or consolidation before further direction. High regulatory uncertainty and macro event risk suggest a period of increased volatility and potential capital rotation.
headlines: UK lawmakers push to ban crypto political donations over foreign interference fears
U.S. inflation report, BNB Smart Chain’s hard fork: Crypto Week Ahead
Dubai bans privacy tokens, tightens stablecoin rules in crypto reset
Veteran trader Peter Brandt hints at silver-like bull run in Monero
Coinbase pushes back against banks to keep rewarding users for holding stablecoins
